issue.title: [Python] Test manylinux2010 in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5839](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5839). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we test manylinux1 builds on Travis-CI. At some point we should test manylinux2010 builds too.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5839?focusedCommentId=16880714) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Ideally in docker-compose so we can move them both out of Travis CI

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5839?focusedCommentId=16887160) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
manylinux2010 is already tested on crossbow, so closing this since we aren't gonna test it on Travis.
